channel.title: I have a problem with my pickup command
channel.description:
Hello, I am currently working on my first server ever. I am using PimpScape as my source. I just added Jagex items to my server and changed the "Pickup" command to work with Jagex items. Now the problem im having is when I spawn a Jagex item like a skillcape, I can wear it but when I take it off it turns into boots with the ID (9999). If you have any idea of what may be causing this, I will appreciate the help very much.
Thank You
Legends PK

item.title: I have a problem with my pickup command
item.dc:creator: @Legends_PK Legends PK
item.description:
@Legends_PK wrote:

Nope, you have to add Item4.java to your client and change the item list to include the new items.

Read full topic
item.source: I have a problem with my pickup command

item.title: I have a problem with my pickup command

item.description:
@erko321 wrote:

i think adding new items is client side correct me if im wrong

Read full topic

item.title: I have a problem with my pickup command

item.description:
@Legends_PK wrote:

Yes but I added the new Jagex items, like everyone else did to their non silab servers when the silab client came out.

Read full topic
